head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SWANSON, JANET T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SWANSON, JANET T.

block.p: SWANSON-Janet T. It is with great sadness that the Board of Directors and Members of the North Fork Women for Women Fund. Inc. mourn the loss of our esteemed Co-Founder, first President and friend on Saturday, August 26. Jan's commitment to women's health, the spirit of her friendship and passion for life will be sorely missed.

SWANSON-Janet T. It is with great sadness that the Board of Directors and Members of the North Fork Women for Women Fund. Inc. mourn the loss of our esteemed Co-Founder, first President and friend on Saturday, August 26. Jan's commitment to women's health, the spirit of her friendship and passion for life will be sorely missed.
